sentences.sentence: RSS < Older Newer > Written by Daniel McAdams Monday August 31, 2020 Over the weekend the Centers for Disease Control dropped a bombshell report on coronavirus/Covid deaths: of the approximately 165,000 "Covid deaths" less than ten thousand died from Covid.
The rest - a vast majority - had on average 2.6 serious additional diseases, with the addition in most cases of extreme advanced age.
Also today: the "largest protest in German history" over the weekend, as estimated millions turned out to oppose mandatory masks and lockdowns.
Similar protests took place in London and in Spain.
